step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HW_POSITION (PID) (SELECT P.POSITION_PID FROM HW_POSITION P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HW_POSITION (PID) (SELECT P.POSITION_PID FROM HW_POSITION P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE T WHERE P.NODE_PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HW_ROUTE (PID) (SELECT P.ROUTE_PID FROM HW_ROUTE P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HW_ROUTE (PID) (SELECT P.ROUTE_PID FROM HW_ROUTE P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE T WHERE P.NODE_PID = T.PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HW_ESTAB (PID) (SELECT P.ESTAB_PID FROM HW_ESTAB_ROUTE_POS P, TEMP_HW_POSITION T WHERE P.POSITION_PID = T.PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HW_ESTAB (PID) (SELECT P.ESTAB_PID FROM HW_ESTAB_ROUTE_POS P, TEMP_HW_ROUTE T WHERE P.ROUTE_PID = T.PID );

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HW_ESTAB (PID) ( SELECT C.ESTAB_PID FROM HW_ESTAB_MAIN M, HW_ESTAB_CONTAIN C, TEMP_HW_ESTAB T WHERE M.GROUP_ID = C.GROUP_ID AND M.ESTAB_PID = T.PID UNION ALL SELECT M.ESTAB_PID FROM HW_ESTAB_MAIN M, HW_ESTAB_CONTAIN C, TEMP_HW_ESTAB T WHERE M.GROUP_ID = C.GROUP_ID AND C.ESTAB_PID = T.PID );
DELETE FROM TEMP_HW_ESTAB A WHERE (A.PID=0 OR A.PID=-1);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HW_POSITION (PID) (SELECT P.POSITION_PID FROM HW_ESTAB_ROUTE_POS P, TEMP_HW_ESTAB T WHERE P.ESTAB_PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HW_ROUTE (PID) (SELECT P.ROUTE_PID FROM HW_ESTAB_ROUTE_POS P, TEMP_HW_ESTAB T WHERE P.ESTAB_PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM HW_POSITION P, TEMP_HW_POSITION T WHERE P.POSITION_PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.NODE_PID FROM HW_POSITION P, TEMP_HW_POSITION T WHERE P.POSITION_PID = T.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.JCTLINK_PID FROM HW_ESTAB_JCT P, TEMP_HW_ESTAB T WHERE P.S_ESTAB_PID = T.PID union all SELECT P.JCTLINK_PID FROM HW_ESTAB_JCT P, TEMP_HW_ESTAB T WHERE P.E_ESTAB_PID = T.PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM HW_ROUTE P, TEMP_HW_ROUTE T WHERE P.ROUTE_PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.NODE_PID FROM HW_ROUTE P, TEMP_HW_ROUTE T WHERE P.ROUTE_PID = T.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HWY_JUNCTION (PID) (SELECT P.JUNC_PID FROM HWY_JUNCTION P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.IN_LINK_PID = T.PID UNION SELECT P1.JUNC_PID FROM HWY_JUNCTION P1, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T1 WHERE P1.OUT_LINK_PID = T1.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HWY_JCT (PID) (SELECT distinct P.JCT_PID FROM HWY_JCT P, TEMP_HWY_JUNCTION T WHERE P.S_JUNC_PID = T.PID union SELECT distinct P.JCT_PID FROM HWY_JCT P, TEMP_HWY_JUNCTION T WHERE P.E_JUNC_PID = T.PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HWY_JUNCTION (PID) (SELECT distinct P.S_JUNC_PID FROM HWY_JCT p , TEMP_HWY_JCT T where P.JCT_PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HWY_JUNCTION (PID) (SELECT distinct P.E_JUNC_PID FROM HWY_JCT p , TEMP_HWY_JCT T where P.JCT_PID = T.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK (PID) (SELECT distinct CN.IN_LINK_PID FROM TEMP_HWY_JUNCTION N, HWY_JUNCTION CN WHERE N.PID = CN.JUNC_PID union SELECT distinct CN.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_HWY_JCT N, HWY_JCT_LINK CN WHERE N.PID = CN.JCT_PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_NODE (PID) (SELECT distinct CN.NODE_PID FROM TEMP_HWY_JUNCTION N, HWY_JUNCTION CN WHERE N.PID = CN.JUNC_PID );
SELECT P.* FROM HW_POSITION P,TEMP_HW_POSITION T WHERE P.POSITION_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM HW_ESTAB_JCT P, TEMP_HW_ESTAB T WHERE P.S_ESTAB_PID = T.PID UNION SELECT P.* FROM HW_ESTAB_JCT P, TEMP_HW_ESTAB T WHERE P.E_ESTAB_PID = T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM HW_ESTAB_ROUTE_POS P,TEMP_HW_ESTAB T WHERE P.ESTAB_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM HW_ROUTE P,TEMP_HW_ROUTE T WHERE P.ROUTE_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM HW_ESTAB P,TEMP_HW_ESTAB T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM HW_ESTAB_MAIN P,TEMP_HW_ESTAB T WHERE P.ESTAB_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM HW_ESTAB_CONTAIN P,TEMP_HW_ESTAB T WHERE P.ESTAB_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM HW_ESTAB_SA P,TEMP_HW_ESTAB T WHERE P.ESTAB_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM HW_ESTAB_NAME P,TEMP_HW_ESTAB T WHERE P.ESTAB_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM HWY_JUNCTION P,TEMP_HWY_JUNCTION T WHERE P.JUNC_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM HWY_JUNCTION_NAME P,TEMP_HWY_JUNCTION T WHERE P.JUNC_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM HWY_SAPA P,TEMP_HWY_JUNCTION T WHERE P.JUNC_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM HWY_JCT P,TEMP_HWY_JCT T WHERE P.JCT_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM HWY_JCT_LINK P,TEMP_HWY_JCT T WHERE P.JCT_PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM HW_POSITION P WHERE p.POSITION_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_HW_POSITION);
DELETE FROM HW_ESTAB_JCT P WHERE p.S_ESTAB_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_HW_ESTAB) OR p.E_ESTAB_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_HW_ESTAB);
DELETE FROM HW_ESTAB_ROUTE_POS P WHERE p.ESTAB_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_HW_ESTAB);
DELETE FROM HW_ROUTE P WHERE P.ROUTE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_HW_ROUTE);
DELETE FROM HW_ESTAB P WHERE p.PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_HW_ESTAB);
DELETE FROM HW_ESTAB_MAIN P WHERE p.ESTAB_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_HW_ESTAB);
DELETE FROM HW_ESTAB_CONTAIN P WHERE p.ESTAB_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_HW_ESTAB);
DELETE FROM HW_ESTAB_SA P WHERE p.ESTAB_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_HW_ESTAB);
DELETE FROM HW_ESTAB_NAME P WHERE p.ESTAB_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_HW_ESTAB);
DELETE FROM HWY_JUNCTION P WHERE P.JUNC_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_HWY_JUNCTION);
DELETE FROM HWY_JUNCTION_NAME P WHERE P.JUNC_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_HWY_JUNCTION);
DELETE FROM HWY_SAPA P WHERE P.JUNC_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_HWY_JUNCTION);
DELETE FROM HWY_JCT P WHERE P.JCT_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_HWY_JCT);
DELETE FROM HWY_JCT_LINK P WHERE P.JCT_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_HWY_JCT);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HW_POSITION SELECT POSITION_PID FROM HW_POSITION A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM HW_POSITION B WHERE A.POSITION_PID = B.POSITION_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HW_ROUTE SELECT ROUTE_PID FROM HW_ROUTE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM HW_ROUTE B WHERE A.ROUTE_PID = B.ROUTE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HW_ESTAB SELECT PID FROM HW_ESTAB A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM HW_ESTAB B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HWY_JUNCTION SELECT JUNC_PID FROM HWY_JUNCTION A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM HWY_JUNCTION B WHERE A.JUNC_PID = B.JUNC_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_HWY_JCT SELECT JCT_PID FROM HWY_JCT A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM HWY_JCT B WHERE A.JCT_PID = B.JCT_PID);
